commit message: v0.3.2: tome of mastery is no longer given at level 1 once unlocked
v0.3.2: rebalanced earlygame enemy stats and distributions
v0.3.2: rebalanced hunger, now scales with max hp
v0.3.2: slightly buffed mages staff base damage
v0.3.2: buffed fury health % trigger
v0.3.2: balance tweaks to huntress and warden
v0.3.2: fixed a bug where non-integer values for sx and sy caused some tile map issues
v0.3.2: reworked the warlock subclass
v0.3.2: rebalanced the Goo fight
v0.3.2: adjusted balance on the cloak of shadows and freerunner
v0.3.2: added some images for new sewers quests
v0.3.2: fixed some sprite mapping
v0.3.2: corrected some AI bugs
v0.3.2: added safety check for rockfall traps
v0.3.2: rebalanced inter-floor warping effects
v0.3.2: adjusted exception throwing on bombs
v0.3.2: fixed Goo's spray effect being visible in the fog
v0.3.2: balance tweaks to the effect of cursed chains
v0.3.2: significantly refactored custom tile visuals
v0.3.2: expansion to custom tile visuals, no an automated way of making a set of them to fill a room
v0.3.2: added in a painter for the mass grave room
v0.3.2: added in a painter for the ritual site room
v0.3.2: fixed a concurrent modification exception in distortion traps
v0.3.2: fixed mass grave occasionally spawning skeletons ontop of eachother.
v0.3.2: added in a painter for the rot garden with some basic sprites
v0.3.2: adjusted ritual site, now occurs in a standard room
v0.3.2: balance tweaks to new warlock effect
v0.3.2: some implementation on the ritual site quest
v0.3.2: lots of wandmaker quest implementation
v0.3.2: fixed some wandmaker quest bugs
v0.3.2: fully implemented elemental embers quest
v0.3.2: implemented corpse dust quest
v0.3.2: added the ability to examine custom tile visuals
v0.3.2: balance / polish pass on elemental embers quest
v0.3.2: tweaked the wandmaker's dialog
v0.3.2: more implementation on rotberry quest (almost done)
v0.3.2: finished spritework for rot garden, png optimization
v0.3.2: lotsa quest polish
v0.3.2: fixed a bug with wandmaker levelgen
v0.3.2: added prison guards
v0.3.2: tweaked fleeing to cancel at a certain distance, tweaked thieves to destroy their stolen item after escaping, tweaked bags to be kept (empty) on ressurect
v0.3.2: rebalanced mimics somewhat, significantly less harsh in the very earlygame.
v0.3.2: fixed a discrepancy in the description of lightened weapons
v0.3.2: waters of transmutation now properly carry over weigtstone imbue.
v0.3.2: mobs now always respawn a little bit away from the player.
v0.3.2: reworked floor 10 and the tengu fight (lots of changes)
v0.3.2: also reworked tengu's sprite
v0.3.2: added some flavour text to the prison
v0.3.2: fixed an inconsistency in fury's description
v0.3.2: fixed a bug that coul cause the wandmaker to spawn twice or more.
v0.3.2: fixed some bugs with tengu boss fight
v0.3.2: thieves now cannot steal upgraded items
v0.3.2: reduced fly swarm's damage some more
v0.3.2: visual tweaks to tengu's 'puff' effect
v0.3.2: twaeked tengu's description, adjusted thief spawn rate on floor 6
v0.3.2: also tweaked skeleton spawn rate on floor 6
v0.3.2: items lost to level 10 layout changes are now returned
v0.3.2: twaked tengu's boss arena to be a bit smaller
v0.3.2: increased shaman attack speed
v0.3.2: tweaks to tengu's visuals and jump behaviour
v0.3.2: fixed teleportation and movement inconsistencies with some characters
v0.3.2: tweaked prison guard behaviour, eliminated bugs, made chains a bit more random, disallowed guards pulling you into a chasm
v0.3.2: tweaked rot lasher health restore adn fixed bugs
v0.3.2: png optimization for some custom tiles
v0.3.2: fixed tengu causing quickslot crashes in some cases
v0.3.2: fixed prison boss maps sometimes permanently changing
v0.3.2: added a window class for a forced notification
v0.3.2: added ability to customize the button text for the new notification window
v0.3.2: implemented notification window for mastery book changes
v0.3.2: changed most passive effects to pause when a floor is locked
v0.3.2: manifest commit
v0.3.2a: fixed one errant tile in prison boss level layout
v0.3.2a: fixed a bug with thieves and slowed them down slightly when they have stolen an item.
v0.3.2a: reduced some of the debuff duration on crazed bandits
v0.3.2a: fixed some bugs with corrupted prison guards
v0.3.2a: tweaked tengu, increased his damage a bit and made him perform one less jump in phase 2.
v0.3.2a: weak floor rooms now guarantee a pit below them
v0.3.2a: refactored how level-generated visuals work, more flexible and resolves bugs
v0.3.2a: also fixed a bug where ore veins would sparkle after being removed.
v0.3.2a: manifest commit
v0.3.2b: fixed a bug where multiple pit rooms would generate
v0.3.2b: fixed a bug where wands bought from the shop would sometimes have excess charges.
v0.3.2b: fixed some bugs with groups and changed level visuals
v0.3.2b: tweaked lock floor effect, allowed for some regen to process if time is awarded.
v0.3.2b: fixed a bug where prison quest enemies would rarely not drop quest items.
v0.3.2b: implemented locked room time mechanics into bosses
v0.3.2b: fixed a bug where the caves boss floor sign would sometimes appear under a trap
v0.3.2b: prevent DM-300 from awarding time from its own toxic gas
v0.3.2b: locked floor count now persists over save/load, also increased base amount to 50
v0.3.2b: reduced the amount of time awarded by tengu
v0.3.2b: manifest commit
